actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

official_title: To amend the Veterans' Benefits Improvement Act of 1996 to eliminate the requirement that members of the Commission on Servicemembers and Veterans Transition Assistance be allocated to separate programs.
short_title: Commission on Servicemembers and Veterans Transition Assistance Improvement Act of 1997

summary.text: Commission on Servicemembers and Veterans Transition Assistance Improvement Act of 1997 - Amends the Veterans' Benefits Improvement Act of 1996 to require the entire Commission on Servicemembers and Veterans Transition Assistance (currently, only specified members of such Commission) to review programs intended to assist members of the armed forces at the time of their separation from military service, including programs designed to assist families of such members.

titles.title: Commission on Servicemembers and Veterans Transition Assistance Improvement Act of 1997

To amend the Veterans' Benefits Improvement Act of 1996 to eliminate the requirement that members of the Commission on Servicemembers and Veterans Transition Assistance be allocated to separate programs.
